column4: PEARL Prompt
column5: David (Self-led Insight)
column6: Calvin (Pattern Interrupt)

column4: “What would have to change for this to feel urgent?”
column5: “What are you comparing it to?”
column6: “Sounds like you’ve adapted — is that working?”
column7: “So if things stay the same, you’re okay with that?”

column3: “I’m not even sure what I’d want instead.”
column4: “If it were perfect, what would it look like?”
column5: “What would make this worth pursuing for you?”
column6: “Let’s get clear on what you’d be solving.”
column7: “If you don’t know the target, how will you get there?”

column3: “This is on the back burner for now.”
column4: “What would move this to the front?”
column5: “What makes this less important than other things?”
column6: “If you don’t prioritize this now, when will you?”
column7: “That’s how people stay stuck — putting it off.”

column4: “What has it cost you over that time?”
column5: “If it hasn’t changed in years, why now?”
column6: “So we’re breaking a decade-long pattern — let’s name that.”

column4: “What happens if you delay 3 more months?”
column5: “Without a trigger, what will make this real?”
column6: “Let’s talk about the cost of waiting.”

column4: “What’s at stake if nothing changes?”
column5: “What’s the price of inaction?”
column6: “Later often means never — should we test that?”
column7: “What’s going to magically make this easier later?”

column4: “What changed now that you’re even here?”
column5: “Why now, and not 6 months ago?”
column6: “Something pulled you here — let’s honor that.”

column4: “What would need to shift to make this doable now?”
column5: “So are you saying now is actually impossible?”
column6: “People make time for what matters — does this?”
column7: “Is that real — or just an easy out?”

column3: “I need to check with my partner.”
column4: “Who else needs to feel good about this?”
column5: “What would you need from them to move forward?”
column6: “Let’s bring them in — or is that a stall?”
column7: “You knew you’d need them — why not involve them now?”

column4: “How do you usually make big decisions?”
column5: “What’s your process been in the past?”
column6: “Let’s make sure that style serves you now.”
column7: “Or is that how you avoid deciding?”

column4: “What specifically are you going to think about?”
column5: “What would you need to know to decide today?”
column6: “Are you gathering clarity or deferring courage?”
column7: “Let’s stop pretending — is it a no?”

column4: “What permission do you need to move forward?”
column5: “Are you waiting to feel 100% safe?”
column6: “There’s no perfect moment — just choice.”

column4: “If money were handled, would this be a yes?”
column5: “If you had the cash, would this be solved?”
column6: “Money’s a symptom — not the real issue.”
column7: “So you’re letting money run your life?”

column4: “What could be shifted to make space for this?”
column5: “What options have you explored already?”
column6: “Resourceful people find options. Want to try?”

column4: “What’s the value if this works?”
column5: “What are you comparing this to?”
column6: “Let’s price the outcome — not the program.”

column4: “Have you ever figured out something you really wanted?”
column5: “What did you do last time you wanted something badly?”
column6: “This isn’t about cash — it’s about creativity.”

column4: “What’s your role in this?”
column5: “If nothing changes, what are you responsible for?”
column6: “No blame — just ownership.”
column7: “If it’s always someone else… is that true?”

column4: “What part of the result will come from you?”
column5: “If this works, who made it work?”
column6: “Systems help — you drive.”

column4: “Do you believe you create your outcomes?”
column5: “How much of this is under your control?”
column6: “Shift from hope to action.”

column4: “What will you do differently this time?”
column5: “We act from truth — not just want.”
column6: “Wanting isn’t doing.”

column4: “What would make this feel safe?”
column5: “Is this emotion from price — or past patterns?”
column6: “Fear = growth. Want in anyway?”

column4: “Is the price or the result the real issue?”
column5: “What’s the difference between discount and disservice?”
column6: “Cheap = less commitment. You ready?”

column4: “What are you trying to protect against?”
column5: “What’s driving the need for control?”
column6: “Control kills results. Still want that?”

column4: “What will you do to make this worth it?”
column5: “What ensures this works for you?”
column6: “ROI = action, not logic. Agree?”

column4: “What proof would make you feel confident?”
column5: “What would restore trust for you?”
column6: “Let’s rebuild proof, not excuses.”
column7: “You’re looking for a reason not to believe.”

column3: “I’m not sure I can follow through.”
column4: “What makes you doubt yourself?”
column5: “Who would you be if you trusted yourself here?”
column6: “Let’s rebuild you.”

column3: “I don’t want to make a mistake.”
column4: “What would feel safe enough to proceed?”
column5: “What’s the worst-case — and can you handle it?”
column6: “Risk = growth. Want to stay the same?”
